channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Compatibility Action Storage Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Compatibility Action Storage Plugin

item.title: CVE-2020-2217|2024-08-04T07:01:41.244Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20compatibility%20action%20storage%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Compatibility Action Storage Plugin 1.0 and earlier does not escape the content coming from the MongoDB in the testConnection form validation endpoint, resulting in a reflected cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability.
